   "body_snippet": "As you know we've servers with short names and they're often in CABs both on Virtualization paltform as well as DNS and computer/host names to make it easy to ready.\r\n\r\nWhen we paste or type in CAPs in Quick Connect, it would lowercase and then connect.. \r\n\r\nWould be nice to connect as typed in Quick Connect. Thanks",

-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): User requested a feature to force uppercase input in the Quick Connect field, likely for compatibility with systems requiring uppercase hostnames.\nApproach: Add a new boolean setting `QuickConnectForceUpperCase` in Settings. Add a checkbox to the Connections options page to toggle this setting. In `QuickConnectComboBox`, bind the inner ComboBox's `CharacterCasing` property to this setting (Upper vs Normal)."
 }
